venue.address_2: Use fitness ctr entrance in rear of bldg
venue.name: Jewish Community Center

item.description:
Hi Team,

We are well into our off season indoor pool practice. We want to get ready for our upcoming race season. What better way to stay in shape than indoor pool practice? As usual we'll be practicing on Tuesdays at the JCC in Providence. We start at 5:35pm until 6:40pm. Don't worry if your a bit late, we won't start padling until 5:50pm.

Cost per practice is still $5/practice. If this is your first time it costs $0. So what do you have to lose? Come down and see what the sport of Dragonboat racing is all about.

We look forward to seeing you there.

OSDBC
item.how_to_find_us: Park behind building and get buzzed in. We'll be at the pool.
item.name: Indoor Pool Practice
